topic: Training Opportunity Offered by the University of Idaho Integrated Design Lab
body:
Radiance Users -


The University of Idaho Integrated Design Lab will be offering a week-long
training on EnergyPlus and Radiance at the end of February of this year.
 See below for details and email jdunn at uidaho.edu with inquiries:


*February 25 – Energy Plus + Radiance Workshop: Modeling Energy Efficient
Buildings*


·     Full 5-day workshop, check out the flyer here:
http://www.idlboise.com/pdf/uiidl_eplus_radiance_training.pdf


·     Learn the technical skills required to perform whole
building energy and daylight simulation, using both EnergyPlus and
Radiance, and understand their application within the Integrated Design
Process.


·     Learn how to use OpenStudio as a graphic user interface throughout
both energy and daylight simulation


·     3 days of EnergyPlus training followed by 2 days of Radiance Training


·     The workshop is designed for beginners and intermediate users of both
programs


·     For more information on the workshop’s syllabus and price, check out
our website (http://idlboise.com/energyplus-radiance-workshop-2013)


*When:* February 25 – March 1, *8:00am* to *5:00pm* (MST).


*Where:*  Integrated Design Lab, 306 S. 6th St in downtown Boise.


*Cost:*  500$-1000$ per person




*Jacob Dunn - LEED AP
*Architectural Simulation Specialist
University of Idaho Integrated Design Lab


p_208.401.0645
a_306 S 6th Street, Boise ID 83702
